item.title: FAA orders 10% cut in flights at several airports as shutdown drags on
item.description: The Trump administration says the move, which will affect 40 markets, is part of an effort to ease pressure on air traffic controllers.

item.title: Elections show a path to power for Democrats, even as GOP redistricts
item.description: Republicans are winning the gerrymandering arms race but Democrats can still win the House if they perform like they did in Tuesday’s elections.
